text:
hey folks, i have a problem with the og:image tag. I have set a featured image in the blog settings but somehow it gets override when i share it on LinkedIn and facebook. Twitter works fine. Here's an example

<https://www.datacouncil.ai/blog/data-science-data-analytics-data-engineering-and-artificial-intelligence-11-online-courses-you-should-check-out>
Hi any body has implemented <https://segment.com/docs/connections/spec/identify/> in HubSpot
is there any way that we can fire a custom event on HubSpot form submit click along with its default functionality ?
Hey guys how do I get the results for a search on my HubSpot blog? Currently just outputs every post? I can it to out put a listing based on the search terms
Can we get the blog post date in the search results listing?>
You can hit the search API `_hcms/search?term=test&type=BLOG_POST`
One of the returned properties is *`publishedDate`*
Is anyone else experiencing this BUG on HubSpot at the moment? The main nav is gone and overall things are pretty wonky.
yes
I am also!
Thanks for making me feel less crazy <@URLPTQKR9> and <@UMH22MWD8> :slightly_smiling_face:
Me too
I tried in Safari and Chrome
i see it on 3 different accounts
Just refreshed and it seems to be working now! In ~Safari~ oops Chrome
same here :slightly_smiling_face:
Yep
Now I'm trying to guess URLs to get to stuff :stuck_out_tongue: Does anyone know the search URL so I can use that instead?
It's back for me for now, but in case it goes away again it's <https://app.HubSpot.com/reports-dashboard/[PORTAL_ID]/marketing?globalSearchQuery=test>

Hi,
We´re building a test inside a landing page that gives different results when you get to the end of it. I Wonder if is there a way to get those results automatically into the body of an e-mail that can be send to the prospect after he/she completes the test.
Any advice will be appreciated
Thanks in advance
<@U25PYL3Q8> Hey man, got a moment??
We often submit those through hidden fields in the HubSpot form
<@UDGAX34Q6> I think the best version of this ive done used local storage / cookies to get the info from one page to another.
